Attalos Hotel in buzzing Psirri neighborhood, offers a central, yet quiet base for exploring the city of Athens. Free Wi-Fi and a business center are available. All rooms are air-conditioned with soundproof windows, direct-dial telephone and satellite flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms with shower include hairdryers and amenities. Coffee-Tea making facilities, iron-iron board are provided upon request. Many balcony rooms also include an outlook of the Acropolis or Lycabettus Hill. Guests can enjoy cool evenings at the hotel’s roof garden which features a view of the Acropolis, or relax with a glass of ouzo and the sounds of Athens. The shopping center of Ermou is 5 minutes’ walk away, while the metro offers quick access to the port and the airport, as well as to all the city’s attractions.

Guests may taste Mediterranean and Asian cuisine at the on-site restaurants and sip signature cocktails at the stylish pool bar or lobby bar. Grand Hyatt also boasts a business centre and meeting rooms with state-of-the-art technologies, ideal for private or corporate events. Porterage and turn-down services are included. name: Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa
description: On the outside, a neoclassical architectural jewel. Inside, a combination of comfort and minimalist aesthetics. A pairing whose fascinating differences make it unpretentiously distinctive. Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa, apart from setting its own tone in the Greek capital’s hospitality, is also the ideal starting point for exploring it: from Eirinis Square, an Athenian corner with its own pulse, it is 300 meters from Monastiraki Square and only a 10-minute walk from Syntagma and Ermou Street, the commercial heart of the city. However, if you decide to spend the day indoors, we have made sure that our facilities and flavors will accompany every moment in an ideal way. From the indoor pool and sauna to the à la carte breakfast served in the rooms and the Omnivore restaurant menu, everything is designed to offer more than just a unique hospitality experience: an amalgam of history and stories in the heart of a city where both can be found in abundance. Use of Spa Area All the reservations include a 30’ minutes complimentary entrance (only once) in Spa Area, more specifically for the pool, the sauna and the steam room. Also we provide a -15% discount in massage service, if it is cοmbined with the complimentary. These services are available upon availability and upon request.

description: Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Athens. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel every room has bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monastiraki Metro Station, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Ivis 4 Boutique Hotel.

name: Live in Athens, Thiseio Historic House
description: Situated in the city center, this welcoming apartment brings all of Athens within your reach. Acropolis is within an easy 14-minute walk and Ancient Agora of Athens is also a quick 5-minute walk away, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Athens by hopping on a metro at either Thissio Station, a short 6-minute walk away, or Kerameikos Station, 8 minutes away. After you return, unwind in the garden or sip a drink on the furnished balcony/patio, and don't forget about the outdoor furniture. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This vacation rental features a living room, a dining area, a memory foam bed, and premium bedding. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as an espresso maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Elia Ermou Athens Hotel
description: Just 800 metres from the world-renowned Acropolis and Acropolis Museum, Elia Ermou Athens Hotel is conveniently set in the heart of Athens. This 4-star hotel features a restaurant and wellness club. Free WiFi is possible. At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have a kettle, while some have a balcony. Selected rooms are equipped with a hammam and spa bath, while some feature Acropolis views. Guests at Elia Ermou Athens Hotel can enjoy an American buffet breakfast. Set on the highest floor, the à la carte restaurant boasts Acropolis views. The wellness club features a range of facilities including a cryosauna, fitness centre and hair salon. The scenic Plaka and the lively Monastiraki are just 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from the property. Private parking is possible upon charge.

name: Ava Hotel & Suites
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Acropolis, the 4-star Ava Hotel and Suites is centrally located in Plaka. It offers spacious, elegantly decorated suites with a private balcony or terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout. Featuring neoclassical décor with wallpapers and carefully chosen furnishings, all suites are air-conditioned and soundproofed. Each has a fully equipped kitchenette, as well as a seating area with a 32” flat-screen TV. A DVD library is provided free of charge. Some of the suites enjoy stunning views of Hadrian Arch, Zeus Temple and the Acropolis. A buffet breakfast including vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free dishes can be enjoyed daily at the dining area. Breakfast dishes with eggs can also be prepared on request. Ava Hotel and Suites is situated 3 minutes’ walk from the metro station. Several taverns and café, as well as the historical and commercial centre of Athens are within a short walking distance. Syntagma Square is at 600 metres and the National Garden 400 metres away.

name: Palladian Home
description: No description found

name: St. Bjur Suites
description: St. Bjur Suites features accommodation with free WiFi right in the heart of Athens, just 80 metres from Monastiraki Square and a few steps from the metro station. The property is set 250 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Monastiraki Flea Market is 120 metres from the hotel, while Acropolis is 1 km away. The Roman Agora is 400 metres away and Anafiotika is at a distance of 800 metres. Venizélos Airport is 34 km from the property.

name: The Social Athens Hotel
description: The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Athens. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station, and Lycabettus Hill. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. A business centre and a bicycle rental service are also offered by The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Museum of Cycladic Art, Syntagma Square and University of Athens - Central Building. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 26.2 km from The Social Athens Hotel, a member of Radisson Individuals.

name: Electra Palace Athens
description: With a great location in the centre of Plaka, facing the Acropolis, this 5-star hotel offers personalised service, a beautiful rooftop pool and well-appointed rooms with a buffet breakfast included. Electra Palace Hotel Athens is within walking distance from most of Athens' main attractions. Syntagma Square is less than 5 minutes' walk away and the parliament and shopping districts are nearby. The spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Thoughtful touches also include bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms offer direct views of the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast provided in the dining area. Electra Palace Hotel's rooftop has a lovely pool area and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The restaurant's terrace looks directly to the Acropolis. The helpful staff at Electra Palace is happy to offer local information and advice. Guests can also make use of the hotel's spa facilities, including an indoor pool and sauna.

name: Baloo Hostel
description: Well located in the centre of Athens, Baloo Hostel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from National Theatre of Greece, 600 metres from Omonia Square and 700 metres from National Archaeological Museum of Athens. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and luggage storage space for guests. Guest rooms include bed linen. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Omonia Metro Station, University of Athens - Central Building and Larissis Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from Baloo Hostel.

name: Pandrosos Divine Suites
description: Providing free WiFi throughout the property, Pandrosos Divine Suites is located in Athens, 200 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station and 300 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station. Popular points of interest nearby include Temple of Hephaestus, Anafiotika and Erechtheion. The property is 200 metres from Monastiraki Square, and within 500 metres of the city centre. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Pandrosos Divine Suites have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Pandrosos Divine Suites include Roman Agora, Ermou Street-Shopping Area and Parthenon. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Stanley
description: Conveniently located in Athens city centre and just steps from Metaxourgeio Metro Station, Stanley Hotel features a rooftop pool, 2 restaurants and 2 bars, including an open-air bar on the rooftop. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a 24-hour front desk. Featuring modern decoration and earthy colours, the rooms at the Stanley Hotel offer a satellite TV and a balcony. Each has a private bathroom with toiletries and hairdryer. Some enjoy views of the Acropolis. Room service is open daily from 06:30am-01:30am. Specializing in Greek cuisine, Icarus Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The rooftop restaurant serves Mediterranean and Greek cuisine and features panoramic views over the city, the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Guests can relax on the furnished rooftop terrace at the pool featuring views of the Acropolis. Additionally, they can enjoy a cocktail at the adjacent bar area offering a 360° view over Athens. Ermou shopping street is 1 km from the Stanley, while the Acropolis Museum is just a 5-minute metro ride. Guests have access to many beaches within a 30-minute drive. Stanley is located outside the traffic restriction ring of Athens, with a very easy access to National Roads. Athens International Airport is 36 km away. Private parking at extra charge is possible on site.

name: 1900 Athenian House
description: Located in Athens and with National Archaeological Museum of Athens reachable within 1.2 km, 1900 ATHENIAN HOUSE provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 2.4 km from University of Athens - Central Building, 1.9 km from Omonia Square and 3.2 km from Monastiraki Square. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at 1900 ATHENIAN HOUSE have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a terrace. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at 1900 ATHENIAN HOUSE. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Omonia Metro Station, Larissis Railway Station and National Theatre of Greece. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 29 km from 1900 ATHENIAN HOUSE, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Editor Hotel Athens
description: Boasting a bar, The Editor Hotel Athens is situated in Athens in the Attica region, less than 300 metres from Monastiraki Square and a 4-minute walk from Ermou Street. Each room is equipped with a Nespresso machine. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from Roman Agora. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Anafiotika is 600 metres from The Editor Hotel Athens, while Monastiraki Flea Market is around 300 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: Ad Athens Luxury Rooms & Suites
description: Just steps from from the New Acropolis Museum, AD Athens Luxury Rooms & Suites has an on-site bar and offers elegant rooms and suites with free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy Greek breakfast at the rooftop terrace offering unobstructed views over the Acropolis. A kids corner with board games and colouring books is also featured on site. Fitted with modern furnishings, the rooms and suites at AD Athens come equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms have a shower with hydromassage jets, a Philips hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax, while some offer views over the Acropolis. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Temple of Olympion Zeus is 300 metres from AD Athens Luxury Rooms & Suites, while Anafiotika is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 35 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens
description: Facing Pedion Areos Park, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens is located just 400 metres from the Archaeological Museum of Athens and a 5-minute walk from Victoria Metro Station. Its rooftop swimming pool operates on a seasonal basis and offers views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. A fitness centre, a sauna and a hammam are available free of charge. The rooms at Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens boast sophisticated urban design and come equipped with a work desk, a mini bar, a safe and a Plasma TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most units offer views to the park and some to the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast which also includes fresh omelettes prepared on the spot upon request. A grab-and-run breakfast including coffee and tea, fresh fruits and energy bars, is also available between 05:00 and 06:30. The Oak Room Café serves a variety of coffees, teas, drinks and snacks, while the all-day Gallo Nero Restaurant serves Italian dishes during lunch and dinner. St Astra East Rooftop restaurant and bar offers panoramic views of the city lights. Syntagma Square is 2.5 km from Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens, while the commercial district of Athens can be reached within a 15-minute walk. The New Acropolis Museum is at a distance of 3 km. Eleftherios Venizelos Airport is 36 km from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site at an extra charge.

name: Athens Capital Hotel - MGallery Collection
description: With classic chic and attentive service, Athens Capital Center Hotel MGallery Collection ensures your stay in this ancient city is unforgettable. From its rooftop terrace and pool, sip a house cocktail as you soak in one of Athens's most enchanting views of the Acropolis. Savour the best of Mediterranean cuisine at the hotel's restaurant or unwind with a drink in its cultured Galerié Café to admire fine art. Enter an oasis of modern, understated elegance in the heart of one of the world's oldest cities.accorhotels.com

name: Classic Retire with Outstanding Lycabettus View
description: No description found

name: Athenaeum Eridanus Luxury Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Athens, Athenaeum Eridanus Luxury Hotel features classically decorated rooms with marble bathrooms. It offers a buffet breakfast. The interiors of Eridanus Luxury Art Hotel feature stylish colour combinations, authentic ceiling frescos and smart lighting. They come with a satellite LCD TV, air conditioning and coffee maker. A fully equipped gym with steam bath is also at your disposal during your stay. Within walking distance from Eridanus, guests can reach the vibrant nightlife of Psiri and Kerameikos, the Monastiraki flea market and the picturesque area of Plaka.

name: Athens Marriott Hotel
description: The Athens Marriott hotel is located on the bustling artery of Syngrou Avenue, within walking distance of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Centre and the Athenian Riviera.Designed to perfection, our rooms and suites, are outfitted with contemporary decor and plush bedding, spa inspired bathrooms and modern workspaces. M Club rooms afford guests access to the M Club, the perfect space to recharge. Stay active in our well-equipped fitness centre or recharge your body and soul with our signature spa treatments. Take your seat in The Great Room or join us outdoors in the Atrium and relax in to the chic, urban setting. Indulge in Mediterranean flavours at the Made in Athens restaurant and surround yourself with impeccable views on the e&o Athens rooftop while relaxing with a cocktail and savouring delicious fusion cuisine. Do business in style in our sophisticated spaces where our on site planners and culinary team will take your event to the next level, ensuring you a memorable experience.Marriott

name: Wyz Attiki Aparthotel
description: Situated in Athens, 1.1 km from National Archaeological Museum of Athens and 1.2 km from National Theatre of Greece, WYZ Attiki Aparthotel features city views and free WiFi. All units are fitted with air conditioning, and all have a flat-screen TV and a kettle. Most units also have a washing machine and a kitchen. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Omonia Square is 1.3 km from WYZ Attiki Aparthotel, while University of Athens - Central Building is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos, 21 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Polis Grand Hotel
description: Polis Grand is located a 5-minute walk from Omonoia Metro Station and 300 metres away from the National Archaeological Museum. It offers a small fitness centre, a rooftop bar overlooking the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill, and rooms with free WiFi. Rooms at Polis Grand Hotel are appointed with elegant furniture and marble bathrooms. They come with air conditioning, a laptop safe and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a balcony with views of Lycabettus Hill and the Acropolis. A rich Greek buffet breakfast is served at the Polis Restaurant. At Polis Life bistro, guests can taste fresh coffee and delicious pies. Refreshing cocktails and Greek cuisine are proposed at the roof garden bar-restaurant with panoramic views over the city. The entertainment districts of Gazi and Psirri, the Monastiraki flea market and the New Acropolis Museum are a few metro stops away. The 24-hour front desk can make arrangements for car rentals, city tours and excursions.

name: Belle Epoque Suites
description: Belle Epoque Suites has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Athens. Located around 700 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 700 metres away from Monastiraki Metro Station. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Monastiraki Square. All rooms are fitted with a fridge, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony. All units have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. An à la carte, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from Belle Epoque Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Athos Hotel
description: Operating throughout the year, Athos Hotel is located in the historical and picturesque area of Plaka. At walking distance from all public transport as well as major historical monuments, with major point of reference the Acropolis. All the rooms feature a mini-bar, direct dial phone, TV, air conditioning, high-speed internet connection, safe box, hair dryer, and toiletries for the bathroom. Superior rooms are more spacious, thus offering more comfort and have private balconies with enchanting views of the Acropolis, side view or city view. Please kinldy note that view is subject to the availability. The roof garden, located on the 6th floor of the hotel, is the perfect spot to enjoy a drink or coffee while enjoying panoramic views of the Acropolis. The recently renovated Athos Hotel ensures a pleasant stay with professional and friendly service.

name: Priamos Hotel Erato
description: Well located in the centre of Athens, Priamos Hotel Erato provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Ancient Agora of Athens, Monastiraki Metro Station, and Monastiraki Railway Station. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms in the love hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Priamos Hotel Erato also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Priamos Hotel Erato include Kerameikos Metro Station, Gazi - Technopoli and Temple of Hephaestus. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the love hotel.

name: Greece U Around Athens Thissio Suites
description: No description found

name: Heart Of Athens
description: Located in Psiri / Monastiraki, Heart of Athens is a perfect starting point from which to explore Athens. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Heart of Athens. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with flat screen television, children's high chair, clothes rack, linens, mirror. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Heart of Athens.Agoda

name: Athenian Foss
description: Attractively located in Athens, Athenian Foss features an à la carte breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 400 metres from Roman Agora, 300 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area and 600 metres from Syntagma Metro Station. Guests can enjoy Greek dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Athenian Foss the rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Athenian Foss.

name: Acropolis Select
description: Ideally located close to the Acropolis and Plaka, Acropolis Select combines comfort and convenience for a great value base in Athens, just 50 metres from the metro. The contemporary rooms at Acropolis Select are well-furnished with Italian design furniture. Each one offers plenty of space and modern bathrooms with bathtubs. The on-site rooftop restaurant serves snacks and Mediterranean cuisine and offers Acropolis views. The friendly and professional staff is available 24 hours a day. They are also happy to provide you with suggestions for day trips and helpful travel information. Acropolis Select is just a short stroll away from the bars and restaurants in the lively Plaka district. The nearby metro station provides easy access to the rest of Athens. The New Acropolis Museum is only 150 metres away.

name: Monument
description: No description found

name: Elite Hotel
description: Boasting a central location offering easy access to both sightseeing and shopping areas as well as public transport, this hotel is ideal for those on a budget. Elite Hotel has a great location on Pireos Street, just 3 minutes walk from Omonia Square and 10 minutes from the old town area of Monastiraki and its historical sites including the Acropolis. Plaka is just beyond Monastiraki. The trendy Psiri area is also very close by. With the hotel’s free Wi-Fi access, you can always easily keep in touch with home. A 24-hour reception is available.

name: Praxitelous Luxury Suites
description: Situated conveniently in Athens, Praxitelous Luxury Suites offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is situated 400 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, 600 metres from Syntagma Metro Station and 500 metres from Syntagma Square. The property is allergy-free and is set 600 metres from Monastiraki Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Praxitelous Luxury Suites features certain units that feature a terrace, and rooms include a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Praxitelous Luxury Suites. Speaking Greek, English and Russian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Omonia Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Praxitelous Luxury Suites.

name: GK Athens
description: No description found

name: Electra Hotel Athens
description: Boasting one of the most central locations in Athens, Electra Hotel Athens is next to Syntagma Square. A 5-minute walk through charming Plaka takes you to the Acropolis. The enchanting rooftop bar-restaurant enjoys Parliament, Syntagma Square and Acropolis views. Recently renovated, the classically furnished rooms come with satellite TV, minibar and work desk with adjustable lamp. The marble bathroom includes a cosmetic mirror, bathrobes and slippers. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast served buffet-style at the rooftop restaurant. During lunch time and dinner, guests are invited to taste creative Mediterranean delicacies and selected wines in an intimate environment. Located on the ground floor with Ermou Street views, the bar-restaurant Terra prepares Greek dishes, snack and drinks. Electra Hotel’s multilingual staff are available 24/7. Free WiFi is available throughout. The hotel is perfectly located on the pedestrian Ermou Street, Athens' major shopping street. It is right next to the Greek Parliament and Syntagma Metro Station.

name: New Hotel
description: This brand new design hotel stands in a prominent central city location, 200 metres from Syntagma Square. With free Wi-Fi throughout the property, New Hotel houses a Mediterranean restaurant and a fitness area. Designed by award-winning Brazilian designers the Campana Brothers, 79-room and non-smoking New Hotel is a member of Design Hotels of the world. The New Hotel was formerly the Olympic Palace Hotel and while strikingly modern in design today, original features have been retained, including the 1940s black marble staircase. Rooms feature floor to ceiling windows, bamboo floors and tables.The impressive bathrooms have solid brass washbasins. LCD TVs are standard. New Hotel is walking distance of the main sights; the Roman ruins of Plaka, the Acropolis and its new museum, the stylish cafe and boutique shopping district of Kolonaki, and the business zone. The New Hotel is a 45-minute metro ride to the Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport. Private parking is available and charges are applicable.

name: Acropolian Spirit Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Athens, a 5-minute walk from Acropolis Museum, Acropolian Spirit Boutique Hotel has a bar and rooms with free WiFi access. The property is close to Temple of Olympion Zeus. The in-house restaurant serves Greek cuisine. Guest rooms in the hotel come with a private bathroom, air conditioning and kettle, while selected rooms also offer a seating area. At the accommodation the rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. Acropolian Spirit Boutique Hotel offers a business centre for guest use. The reception at the hotel can provide tips on the area. Acropolis is 600 metres from Acropolian Spirit Boutique Hotel, while Odeum of Herodes Atticus is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Tivoli
description: Conveniently located in the Chaidari district of Athens, Tivoli is set 6.1 km from TEI Piraeus, 7.5 km from Kerameikos Metro Station and 7.7 km from Gazi - Technopoli. Featuring a shared lounge, the 1-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. At Tivoli all rooms have bed linen and towels. Omonia Square is 8.1 km from the accommodation, while National Theatre of Greece is 8.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 39 km from Tivoli.

name: Coco-Mat Hotel Athens
description: Located in Kolonaki, one of the most high-end districts in Athens, Coco-Mat Hotel Athens offers elegantly designed units close to major touristic attractions and vibrant areas of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. Every room at Coco-Mat Hotel Athens has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms open to a balcony with Athens views, while others feature a seating area. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Rooms include a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while free toiletries are also offered. Several shops are available on site. Free use of bicycles is available at this hotel. The surrounding area boasts an abundance of modern bars, restaurants and premium boutiques. Acropolis is at 3 km. Athens International Airport is at 34 km.

name: Cityzoe Athens Suites
description: Set in Athens, less than 1 km from Parthenon and 800 metres from the centre, Cityzoe Athens Suites offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. A fridge is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Cityzoe Athens Suites offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Anafiotika, Erechtheion and Acropolis. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Cityzoe Athens Suites.

name: Athens Way
description: Located in the heart of Athens, Athens Way offers soundproofed rooms with free wired internet and flat-screen TVs. It is 2 km from the Acropolis. The spacious air-conditioned rooms at the Athens Way feature a contemporary style. They are all equipped with en suite bathroom with hairdryer. Athens way is a short walk to the National Archaeological Museum and the Monastiraki flea market. Panepistimio Metro Station is a 5-minute walk, allowing for easy travel throughout the city.

name: The Aristotelian Suites by Athens Stay
description: Set 1.2 km from Filopappos Hill, The Aristotelian Suites by Athens Stay offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with an oven and a fridge, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Syngrou/Fix Metro Station, Neos Kosmos Metro Station and Acropolis Museum. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from The Aristotelian Suites by Athens Stay.

name: Herodion Hotel
description: Situated at the foot of the Acropolis, Herodion Hotel offers elegantly decorated air-conditioned rooms. It has a beautiful roof garden with sun loungers and 2 hot tubs boasting spectacular views over Athens. The modern rooms feature light wood furnishings and parquet floors. They are fitted with a satellite TV, safety box and soundproofed windows. Most of the rooms have private balconies and some have a view of the Acropolis. Offering direct views of the Acropolis, the rooftop PointA restaurant is fitted with a decked terrace, serving Mediterranean cuisine with Greek influences, and a variety of cocktails. In between, guests can enjoy snacks and homemade desserts in the semi-outdoor area in the hotel's back garden. An indoor restaurant is also included and American breakfast is served. Hotel Herodion is just a few steps from the new Acropolis Museum and a 15-minute walk from the central Syntagma Square. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 200 metres from the hotel.

name: The Koukaki Residence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include hypo-allergenic bedding, laundry facilities, a freezer, and slippers.Expedia

name: Meni Hotel
description: Set in Athens, within 300 metres of National Theatre of Greece and 600 metres of Omonia Square, Meni Hotel offers accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Meni Hotel include National Archaeological Museum of Athens, Monastiraki Flea Market and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos, 21 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Roy Hotel
description: Featuring a bar, ROY Hotel is located in Athens in the Attica region, 1.9 km from Larissis Railway Station and 2.1 km from National Archaeological Museum of Athens. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the hotel have a balcony. At ROY Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Staff speak Arabic, German, Greek and English at the reception. National Theatre of Greece is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Omonia Square is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from ROY Hotel.

name: Arion Athens Hotel
description: Arion Athens Hotel is a modern, city centre hotel, a 2-minute walk from Monastiraki Metro Station and a minute walk from Psiri. It features bright, stylish rooms and a rooftop garden with stunning Acropolis view. The 3-star hotel offers contemporary rooms with luxurious marble bathrooms, wooden floors, doubled-glazed, soundproofed windows and fire doors. A number of the rooms also feature a balcony or large windows with Acropolis view. A rich English buffet breakfast is served on the mezzanine floor, between 7:30 and 10:15 in the morning and includes hot and cold delicacies, coffee, tea, juices, cereal, yogurt and much more. The hotel’s extremely convenient location provides easy access to the Monastiraki Flea Market, Plaka, Thiseion, as well as Syntagma Square. The hotel has a large lobby and a reception which remains open 24 hours a day. The staff are at hand all day, providing guests with information about the city, sightseeing, transportation, excursions.

name: Tempi Hotel
description: This centrally situated, family-run hotel is just metres from Monastiraki Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The 24-hour front desk offers tourist services. Tempi Hotel is located in a quiet, pedestrian street near Monastiraki. Plaka is 2 minutes' walk, while guests may enjoy views of the Acropolis as soon as they step out of the hotel. The simply furnished rooms of the hotel Tempi are equipped with satellite TV. Some rooms have a view of the Acropolis and the flea market. There is a communal kitchen available at the hotel, where guests can prepare breakfast or a quick snack. All hotel guests have access to our small library. A luggage lift is also available. The Tempi Hotel offers free luggage storage service. Other hotel services include wake up service and taxi service, as well as printer and free maps.

name: The Vault Athens
description: Attractively set in the Athens City Centre district of Athens, The Vault Athens is situated 600 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, 600 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 700 metres from Omonia Square. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Monastiraki Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Vault Athens rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from The Vault Athens, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Golden Age Hotel
description: This 4-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from Megaro Mousikis Metro Station and 2 stops from the historical and shopping centre of Athens. It offers soundproofed rooms with satellite TV. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The elegant rooms at the Golden Age are fully air conditioned and have black-out drapes. They all include an in-room safe. A rich American breakfast buffet, which also includes a Greek corner with fresh, traditional products, is served each morning. The Golden Age Hotel’s 2 restaurants serve gourmet Mediterranean dishes. Catering also for guests’ business needs, the hotel has a range of conference rooms able to accommodate from 10 to 360 participants. The Athens Concert Hall is 400 metres away. The hip Kolonaki district is approximately 900 metres from the hotel.

name: Semiramis
description: Facing a tranquil green park in the Kifissia area of north Athens, the boutique hotel Semiramis is the creation of designer, Karim Rashid. Member of Design Hotels worldwide, the Semiramis ideally combines design, comfort and functionality. Works from the owner’s extensive art collection including pieces by Jeff Koons, Sue Webster and Tim Noble can be viewed at the Semiramis’ bi-annually rotating exhibition in public hotel spaces. All its guestrooms and public areas carry Rashid's distinctive signature. Light pinks and greens, oranges and subtle yellows are reproduced in walls, floors, furnishings and fittings for an energetic atmosphere. Semiramis' global guests may stay in touch with the world or the office - internet TVs complete with cordless keyboards come as standard. The hotel's two-level restaurant and bar, serve contemporary Greek, European and international flavours. The Semiraris is right on Kefalari Square, 5 minutes from Kifissia. It is 10 minutes from the business centre of Marousi and 30 minutes from the centre of Athens.

name: Koniama Acropolis
description: Located in Athens and with Neos Kosmos Metro Station reachable within less than 1 km, Koniama Acropolis provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Acropolis Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also offer city views. At Koniama Acropolis each room includes bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Akropolis Metro Station, Temple of Olympion Zeus and Syngrou/Fix Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from Koniama Acropolis, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sweet Home Hotel
description: Located in the picturesque area of Plaka, the 2-star rated Sweet Home Hotel is 400 metres from Syntagma Square and the metro station. It features elegant accommodation and a bar. Free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk are provided. Combining classical décor with modern elements, all air-conditioned rooms offer a 32'' interactive flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each is soundproofed and with a working desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a cabin shower, hairdryer and free Apivita toiletries. Some rooms open to a balcony with Acropolis views. The area of Monastiraki with several dining and entertainment options is at 600 metres from Sweet Home. Guests can visit the Acropolis Hill and the relevant museum within a 10-minute walk.

name: Pi Athens
description: Offering a sun terrace and views of the garden, Pi Athens is located in Athens, 200 metres from Panathenaic Stadium. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Each room includes Cocomat mattresses and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. You will also find a kettle in the room. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find Papoutsanis free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guests benefit from discounted rates at Holmes Place Health Club with access to the swimming pool, the sauna, the hammam and the gym. There is no 24-hour front desk at the property. Museum of Cycladic Art is 600 metres from Pi Athens, while War Museum is 700 metres away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Melia Athens
description: Located just a short walk from Athens’ attractions, luxurious 4-star hotel Melia Athens features a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the Acropolis. All guests enjoy free access to its health club, the seasonal outdoor pool and the hot tub. Guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Feature a minibar, satellite TV and marble bathrooms with jet shower cabins. Free 3Mps WiFi access, is provided throughout. On the top floor, is located the air-conditioned health club, which includes a sauna and Turkish steam baths, complimentary for our guests. There is also a fully equipped fitness centre. A seasonal outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor hot tub are also provided. The property facilities include restaurants serving International flavours, cocktails and drinks. The nearest metro station is Omonia square, at 200 meters (5 minutes walk). Melia Athens Hotel offers a variety of dining and entertainment options. Sky Lounge Rooftop Dining Bar, operates mid- April to mid- November, weather permitted, depending on Hotel’s management decision. It is located on the 9th floor, offering Greek modern cuisine and spectacular views.

name: Pan Hotel
description: Located in Athens, 200 metres from Syntagma Square, the family-owned Pan Hotel has been operating since the 1960's. It features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Every room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. Extras include slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Pan Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Several restaurants, bars and shops can be found within proximity. The hotel also offers car hire. Zappion - National Garden is 200 metres from Pan Hotel, while Adrianou Street is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Neratzia Rooms
description: No description found

name: Coco-Mat Athens Jumelle
description: COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Athens. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel, rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre and terrace. Guests can swim in the indoor pool or use the business centre that offers printing, copying and fax services. Popular points of interest near COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle include Benaki Museum, Museum of Cycladic Art and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Athens Ivy Suites
description: Featuring a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Athens Ivy Suites is set in the centre of Athens, 500 metres from Monastiraki Square. The property is situated 200 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, 500 metres from Syntagma Metro Station and 300 metres from Syntagma Square. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near Athens Ivy Suites include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Roman Agora. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Dusit Suites Athens
description: Facilities and services include 24hr reception, internet access, concierge facilities, elevator, laundry facilities, dry cleaning, spa facilities, sauna, swimming pool, bar and restaurant.Rooms feature internet access, mini bar, safe, cable/satellite TV, desk, balcony, coffee/tea making facilities and hairdryer.Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions.Address: Lazaraki 42 & Pandoras 3, Glyfada, Athens, 16674 Greece.Sembo

name: Ederlezi Zoubourlou Aparthotel
description: Featuring a bar and free WiFi, Ederlezi Zoubourlou Aparthotel is located in the centre of Athens, close to Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Omonia Square, Omonia Metro Station and National Theatre of Greece. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Ederlezi Zoubourlou Aparthotel.

name: The Newel Acropolis
description: No description found

name: Acropolis Hill
description: The newly built Acropolis Hill is the most recent gem of the Tour Hotel Group, in the area around Acropolis. It is located near the impeccable new Acropolis Museum and the historical centre of Athens. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The stylish and contemporary guest rooms feature wooden floors and comfortable beds. Wi-Fi is free and available throughout the premises. Some rooms feature Acropolis views. Guests enjoy great views of the Acropolis, the Filopapou Hill, the sea, and across the city of Athens from the communal roof terrace, located on the 5th floor. An on-site restaurant is also included and American buffet breakfast is served daily. Just a short walk from the hotel guests can visit Plaka, Syntagma, Monastiraki and other various Athenian places of interest. It is easily accessible by Syngrou-Fix subway and tram stop or by bus.

name: Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre
description: A modern hotel in the heart of ancient Athens Nestled in the heart of Athens, the Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre hotel offers easy access to the city's ancient sites, including the Acropolis complex and nearby Acropolis Museum. Our location just a short walk from the Megaro Moussikis metro station means you can easily explore all that Athens has to offer, from the historic Syntagma Square to the trendy boutiques of Kolonaki. With 14 high-tech function spaces, our hotel is the perfect choice for business travellers, offering meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 430 people. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director is on hand to ensure that your event is a success. Our hotel also offers a range of amenities designed to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. Enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel, as well as soundproof rooms with digital media hubs and LCD TVs. Our Sleep Advantage® programme, which includes soft bedding and Quiet Zones, will help ensure you get a peaceful night's sleep. Start your day with an American breakfast buffet in our elegant Ambrosia Restaurant, which offers great views of the city. In the evening, dine on seasonal Greek and international cuisine, and relax over drinks in our plush Nectar Bar. And with our rooftop garden featuring a seasonal restaurant and pool, you can enjoy stunning views of Athens while dining or lounging by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ambrosia Suites & Aparts
description: Featuring a bar and free WiFi throughout, Ambrosia Suites offers accommodation in Athens. Omonia Square is 200 metres away. Opening to a balcony with city views, all tastefully decorated units at Ambrosia are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a safety box. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. All rooms except economy type, come with a balcony. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Room service and free luggage storage are also available. National Archeological Museum is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 20 km from the property. Airport shuttle can be arranged upon charge.

name: Electra Metropolis
description: Located in the heart of Athens, just 200 metres from Syntagma Square, the modern Electra Metropolis boasts a small, rooftop pool with waterfall effect, and a sun terrace with views over the city. Gourmet dishes and refreshing cocktails can be enjoyed at the top-floor restaurant or at the M Bar offering panoramic views over the Acropolis. The elegant rooms and suites at Electra Metropolis feature modern decor, wooden floors and warm tones. Each includes a marble-tiled bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and organic KORRES toiletries. A work desk, 40'' Smart TV with satellite channels, a laptop safe and a mini bar are standard. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. A retro-style lounge area, where guests can enjoy a coffee or a drink, is featured at the unique sky-light atrium decorated with Fassianos artwork and located at the center of the building. Guests can also taste Mediterranean flavours at the ground-floor bistro featuring an open kitchen. Extra services include a 24-hour front desk and room service. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found just steps from Electra Metropolis, while the scenic Plaka area can be reached within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the property.

name: Athenswas Design Hotel
description: Situated in Dionysiou Areopagitou, the most scenic pedestrian street in Athens, AthensWas hotel is set right opposite of the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum. The Temple of Olympion Zeus is a few steps away and Syntagma Square is a 10-minute walk away. Designed in line with the core principles of classical Modernism, AthensWas features uncluttered lines and natural materials. Each room opens out to a furnished veranda and has a worktable, minibar, flat-screen TV, safety box, hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. A Nespresso coffee machine is also included in every room and suite. Offering spectacular views over the Acropolis and the city of Athens, the Sense Restaurant is located on the 7th floor of the hotel and serves modern Greek cuisine. Extra facilities include laundry services, a business centre, a fitness room, car rental and guided city tours. Transfer services to/from Athens Airport and the port of Piraeus can be arranged. Acropolis Metro station is located 160 meters away. MODERN is the new Food & Beverage outlet of AthensWas Hotel. Located on the hotel’s ground floor, MODERN consists of a calm and unpretentious ambience offering delectable comfort food and a fine selection of primarily Greek wines and refreshing cocktails.

name: Dunlin Hotel
description: Boasting a shared lounge, a terrace as well as a bar, Dunlin Hotel is set in the centre of Athens, 400 metres from Omonia Square. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dunlin Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Dunlin Hotel include National Theatre of Greece, Omonia Metro Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 30 km from the hotel.

name: Philippos Hotel
description: Philippos Hotel is ideally located right next to the Acropolis Museum and a 5-minute walk from the Acropolis Metro Station. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Hotel rooms are sunny and modern, styled with elegant fabrics and earthy colours. Each is air conditioned and comes with a TV and fridge. Some rooms have Acropolis views from their windows. Buffet breakfast is served at the all-day café. Lunch and dinner are served at the sister hotel Herodion Hotel, located only 40 metres away. Philippos Hotel is conveniently located at the city centre, next door to the old quarters of the city with its old style charm and affordable shopping and dining options. The central square of Syntagma is just a 15 minutes’ walk away. The attentive staff are on hand 24/7 and can offer sightseeing information, or arrange for car rental, dry cleaning and luggage storage.

name: Philia Boutique Hotel
description: Philia Boutique Hotel offers accommodation set 700 metres from the centre of Athens and provides a garden and a terrace. Complimentary WiFi is featuredthroughout the property. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near Philia Boutique Hotel include Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Urbanstay
description: UrbanStay features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Athens, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a fridge and a stovetop. Every unit has a private bathroom and a bath or shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenware. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. The restaurant at the aparthotel specialises in Greek cuisine. UrbanStay offers a terrace. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near UrbanStay include Monastiraki Metro Station, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Lekka Hotel & Spa
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Athens, The Lekka Hotel & Spa offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at The Lekka Hotel & Spa also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An American, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near The Lekka Hotel & Spa include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Play Theatrou Athens
description: Situated in Athens and with Monastiraki Square reachable within 500 metres, Play Theatrou Athens features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 500 metres from National Theatre of Greece, less than 1 km from University of Athens - Central Building and a 9-minute walk from Roman Agora. The property is 600 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, and within 800 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Play Theatrou Athens offers some units that have a balcony, and every room is equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Staff speak Greek and English at the reception. Popular points of interest near Play Theatrou Athens include Monastiraki Metro Station, Omonia Square and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Athens Warehouse Boutique Hotel & Suites
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 11 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Property Location With a stay at Athens Warehouse Boutique Hotel & Suites, you'll be centrally located in Athens, a 2-minute drive from Syntagma Square and 7 minutes from Acropolis. This 4-star aparthotel is 1.8 mi (2.9 km) from Acropolis Museum and 1.8 mi (2.9 km) from Parthenon. Dining Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. name: The Gem Society Hotel
description: Situated in Athens and with Monastiraki Square reachable within 700 metres, The Gem Society Hotel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. The property is 700 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a terrace and others also boast city views. At The Gem Society Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Arabic, Greek, English and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monastiraki Metro Station, Omonia Square and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from The Gem Society Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Karitsi Place
description: Karitsi Place is centrally located in Athens, not far from Syntagma Square and Zappion - National Garden. Free, fast WiFi is provided throughout the property. You are in the heart of the city's Nightlife and Entertainment! Each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and stove, a seating area with a sofa, a 32'', flat-screen TV and private bathroom with shower. Some units include 2 bathrooms. A toaster and a fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and safety deposit box. Towels, bed linen, bath amenities are provided. Karitsi Place is located in a lively district where several restaurants and bars are featured. Adrianou Street is 500 metres from the apartment. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 19 km away.

name: Novus City Hotel
description: The 4-star Novus City Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Athens. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool. Novus City Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Athens or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Achilleas Hotel
description: With an excellent location in Athens city centre, 2 minutes' walk from Syntagma Square and close to all the historical sites, Hotel Achilleas offers clean, modern rooms and friendly service. Free Wi-Fi, breakfast included in the room rate and a 24-hour reception are some of the things on offer at Hotel Achilleas. The rooms come with mini fridge, flat screen smart TV, safe and luxurious bathroom with free amenities and can accommodate 4 people. Just a stroll from Hotel Achilleas will take you to the Acropolis, the Temple of Olympius Zeus, Plaka and Monastiraki. The best shopping in Athens, on Ermou Street, and great dining and entertainment are on your doorstep. A Metro station and the bus stop to Athens Airport are also a few steps away.

name: Nlh Monastiraki - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Athens, NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room includes a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Staff speak Greek, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near NLH MONASTIRAKI - Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels include Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Diros Hotel
description: Diros Hotel is centrally located 100 metres away from Omonoia Metro Station and just a 10-minute walk from the major tourist attractions of Athens. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access and serves continental breakfast in the morning. Diros rooms are tastefully decorated in pastel colours and open out to private balconies. They come with a TV and air conditioning, and they all have an en-suite bathroom with bathtub or shower. Drinks, coffees and fresh juices are served at the hotel’s bar. More bars, restaurants and cafes can be found within walking distance in the picturesque areas of Plaka and Monastiraki. The National Theatre is located right opposite the hotel. The central Syntagma Square is 1.5 km away, as well as the shopping district of Ermou. Acropolis can be reached within 2 km. Private parking is available near the property.

name: Bmv Apartments
description: Situated 1.3 km from National Theatre of Greece, BMV APARTMENTS offers a garden, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has an oven, a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near BMV APARTMENTS include Larissis Railway Station, Omonia Square and Kerameikos Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: The Dolli at Acropolis
description: We could go Parthenon (and on) about the views from the Dolli, which we guarantee will elicit a wax-lyrical reaction every time the Acropolis comes into sight. References to this neoclassical, listed mansion’s fabric-shop origins have been woven throughout the interiors, while keeping the palette light, bright, and mostly white. The neutrality inside directs your gaze to the ancient beauty outside, which is best admired from the hotel’s landmark-revealing rooftop, which spotlights one of the seven wonders of the world. Mr & Mrs Smith

name: Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels
description: Situated in the very heart of the commercial and business district of Athens, the Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is perfect for business and leisure travellers looking for a unique design hotel overlooking Omonoia Square. Each room showcases avant-garde design and modern features. Recharge your iPod and mobile devices at the charging station in your room, which also features a laptop-size safe. Relax in your spacious room and enjoy a peaceful night’s sleep, courtesy of soundproofed windows. Wear the slippers and Terry bathrobe that are thoughtfully provided for your comfort. Start your day with American buffet breakfast at the bright and elegant dining area. Snacks are served throughout the day, as well as aperitivo with Greek tapas before dinner. The on-site restaurant proposes Greek fusion cuisine. Combining style and creativity, the Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is also fully equipped with high technology amenities for business functions. There are meeting and banqueting services accommodating up to 20 persons, as well as a 24-hour business centre and free WiFi access throughout the hotel. Guests on a leisure trip can take advantage of the many services on offer through the hotel, including a stylist and concierge, while a fully equipped fitness room is also available. VIP turn down service is also provided. Athens Tiare by Mage Hotels is right across from the metro, tram and bus stations, allowing for quick access around Athens. There are also art galleries, museums and trendy bars close by, along with the many historical sites.

All of the rooms are soundproofed and feature free WiFi. The Parliament gourmet restaurant specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, and enjoys a view to Stadiou Street. The Plaza Lounges offer an excellent variety of coffees and desserts. In the intimate wood-paneled surroundings of the Explorer's Lounge, guests can enjoy the atmosphere of old Athenian clubs, while sipping cocktails and tasting snacks. A breakfast and happy-hour drinks are available. Business guests will find 3 conference rooms with state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and a 24-hour business center with high-speed Internet access. The Athens Plaza is only 50 m from Syntagma Metro Station and a short walk to the Benaki Museum. At about 5 minutes on foot from NJV Athens Plaza, the elegant neighborhood of Kolonaki allures with its haute couture boutiques, gourmet restaurants and trendy cafes.VRBO

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monastiraki Square, National Theatre of Greece and Ermou Street-Shopping Area. Modernly decorated with well-chosen furnishings and soft colours, all units at Lozenge come with air conditioning, coffee machine and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience, while most also open to balconies. The bathrooms come with a bathtub or shower, slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A unique feature of the Divani Palace Acropolis hotel is the ancient ruins of Themistocles wall, discovered in the foundations during construction and tastefully incorporated in the hotel's architectural design. The rooftop restaurant Acropolis Secret is open during the summer season and serves Greek and international dishes. Aspassia, the main restaurant, offers Mediterranean cuisine and American breakfast in a stylish setting. The hotel can arrange a free shuttle bus to Syntagma Square during your stay. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 500 metres, while scenic Plaka is a 10-minute walk away.

The Acropolis, Agora, Plaka, Thission and Monastiraki Flea Market are nearby, so are upmarket boutiques, world-renowned museums and the city’s vibrant business district. With 102 rooms and suites, a Penthouse Suite with private outdoor pool overlooking the fabled Acropolis, the awarded Tudor Hall Restaurant featuring modern cuisine and incomparable views of the city’s landmarks, King George finds its best expression in the outstanding personalized service.Marriott

A flat-screen TV, a telephone and slippers are also included. Those staying at the property can wake up to a satisfying breakfast served every morning, before venturing out from Metropolis Hotel Athens to discover the surrounding region. Athens's attractions, such as Ermou Street and Syntagma Square, are easily accessible on foot from Metropolis. Guests can also visit the Acropolis Museum, National Bank of Greece and Parthenon Temple.Revato

Our boutique hotel offers a modern interpretation of Plato’s Academy, designed to awaken the senses. You'll find yourself entranced by our elegant decor, which echoes ancient Greek architecture, in addition to the stunning contemporary design elements that exist throughout our luxury hotel. Every one of our 60 hotel rooms provides all you need to unwind after a day of excitement. Join us here in Athens, Greece to enjoy boutique amenities like a heated pool, a stylish lobby lounge, a rich breakfast experience at Symposium Restaurant, an all day bar lounge area Plato Bar and a unique culinary experience of Japanese fusion cuisine at NYX Rooftop Restaurant with spectacular view to Acropolis.Marriott

Urban Frame Acropolis offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Akropolis Metro Station, Temple of Olympion Zeus and Syngrou/Fix Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Urban Frame Acropolis.

name: Alva Athens Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in Athens, Alva Athens Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The units come with a fridge, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Alva Athens Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Omonia Square, Omonia Metro Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Alva Athens Hotel.

name: Omiros Hotel
description: The fully refurbished Hotel Omiros enjoys a central location in Athens, only a few minutes’ walk from Syntagma Square and the new Acropolis Museum. The 3-star Omiros Hotel offers guestrooms equipped with en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. Also available are safety deposit boxes. Guests can make use of the free internet facilities provided in the rooms. The hotel’s convenient location close to the Benaki Museum, the old Olympic Games stadium and the traditional settlement of Plaka allows guests to easily discover Athens.

name: Art Hotel Athens
description: Set in a renovated 1930s building, this city centre boutique hotel has a small seasonal pool and offers stylish, air-conditioned accommodation with within walking distance of the National Theatre. Omonoia Metro Station is a 10-minute walk. The sophisticated rooms are distinctively designed and feature contemporary furniture which create an elegant atmosphere. Each is equipped with satellite/cable TV and a laptop safe. At the hotel’s cafeteria and elegantly furnished bar-restaurant, guests can relax with a drink or coffee and a light snack, or enjoy a full meal. The Hotel Athens Art features a large multi-purpose hall, hosting art exhibitions, galleries and conventions. Free Wi-Fi is available in public hotel areas. The Art Hotel Athens is within walking distance of the Archaeological Museum, the Acropolis, and the ancient Plaka district. The friendly staff of the Art Hotel Athens will be happy assist guests with tourist information, as well as book restaurants, organize sightseeing tours or suggest cultural events. Free maps are available.

name: Suites@syngrou-Fix
description: Situated in Athens, 700 metres from Acropolis Museum, SUITES@SYNGROU-FIX features views of the city. The property is around 2.9 km from Acropolis, 2.9 km from Parthenon and 2.9 km from Erechtheion. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. All units in the hotel are fitted with cooking hobs and espresso coffee machine with free capsules. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge and an iron. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at SUITES@SYNGROU-FIX. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Odeum of Herodes Atticus, Filopappos Hill and Temple of Olympion Zeus. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from SUITES@SYNGROU-FIX.

name: Bohemian Suites Athens
description: Ideally set in Athens, Bohemian Suites Athens offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Boasting a garden, the property is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from University of Athens - Central Building, a 13-minute walk from Syntagma Square and 1.3 km from Museum of Cycladic Art. The property has family rooms. At the property, the rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, mini fridge and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe, a safety box, a hairdryer and a tea station. A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at Bohemian Suites Athens. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include National Archaeological Museum of Athens, Omonia Square and Ermou Street-Shopping Area. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 31 km from Bohemian Suites Athens.

name: Athens Center Square Hotel
description: Strategically located, within 500 metres from Plaka and Monastiraki Square, Athens Center Square hotel is a short walk from all the major archaeological sites. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and stunning view of the Acropolis. The stylish rooms at Athens Center are individually decorated and have a large window. They are equipped with air conditioning, fridge, flat-screen satellite TV and safe. In the modern bathrooms, you will find free toiletries. Start each day with a rich buffet breakfast with Greek delicacies included in your room rate. For early departures the hotel offers basic breakfast all night long. There is also a bar and a cafe, where guests can enjoy their drink. Relax on Athens Center Square's rooftop and admire the panoramic views of the city and the Acropolis. The hotel’s staff can offer travel information and recommendations for the nearby restaurants and taverns. The shopping district of Ermou is also a short walk away. Monastiraki Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and has direct connection to the airport and port.

name: Spot Apart
description: Set in Athens, less than 1 km from the centre and a 7-minute walk from Omonia Metro Station, Spot Apart offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include University of Athens - Central Building, National Theatre of Greece and National Archaeological Museum of Athens. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 29 km from Spot Apart, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: No description found
