Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. name: 507 Athens
description: Set in Athens, less than 1 km from Syngrou/Fix Metro Station and a 12-minute walk from Neos Kosmos Metro Station, 507 Athens offers a restaurant and city views. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bathrobes. An oven, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a sun terrace. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near 507 Athens include Acropolis Museum, Akropolis Metro Station and Temple of Olympion Zeus. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Ceramian Athens
description: Offering city views and free WiFi, Ceramian Athens offers accommodation situated conveniently in the centre of Athens, within a short distance of Kerameikos Metro Station, Gazi - Technopoli and National Theatre of Greece. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units feature a seating area and/or a terrace. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Metro Station, Omonia Square and Monastiraki Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from Ceramian Athens.

name: Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel
description: Boasting a shared lounge, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel is situated in the centre of Athens, 200 metres from Monastiraki Square. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel provides some rooms that have a terrace, and all rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Hellenic Vibes Smart Hotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Ermou Street-Shopping Area. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Shila Athens
description: Conveniently situated in Athens, Shila Athens provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a rooftop. The property is located less than 1 km from Syntagma Square, an 18-minute walk from Ermou Street-Shopping Area and 1.6 km from Lycabettus Hill. The hotel features suites for couples and family suites. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle and an Espresso coffee machine. At Shila Athens each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.Some suites come with 2 bathrooms. A breakfast basket with fresh products is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Shila Athens include Museum of Cycladic Art, University of Athens - Central Building and National Garden. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 33 km from the hotel.

name: Cohort Koukaki
description: Located in Athens, 300 metres from Acropolis Museum and 1.4 km from the centre, Cohort Koukaki provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near Cohort Koukaki include Syngrou/Fix Metro Station, Akropolis Metro Station and Odeum of Herodes Atticus. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Green Suites Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Athens, 4.8 km from Omonia Metro Station, Green Suites Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have city views. At Green Suites Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Larissis Railway Station is 5 km from the accommodation, while University of Athens - Central Building is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from Green Suites Boutique Hotel.

name: Great Living Koukaki
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and towels.Expedia

name: Economy Hotel
description: Economy Hotel offers a rooftop terrace with city views, and soundproofed rooms with breakfast included. It is a 5-minute walk from Omonoia Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Athens’ historic centre. Economy rooms come equipped with minibar and TV, and each features a private bathroom with hairdryer. They are all air-conditioned and offer a small balcony. Guests can take a walk to the area of Plaka offering cafés, restaurants, and bars, or head to the popular flea market at Monastiraki. Back at the hotel, guests can enjoy the beautiful panoramic views of Athens and Lycabettus Hill from the shaded rooftop terrace. There is free wired internet at the lobby.

name: Pagration Youth Hostel
description: Located in the Vyronas district of Athens, the family-operated Pagration Hostel offers dormitory beds without curfew. It features free Wi-Fi access and a shared kitchen just 1.5 km from Constitution Square. After a day of city exploration, Pagration’s lounge area offers a pleasant place to curl up with a book from the hostel’s exchange book service or enjoy one of its table games. Guests can use the communal kitchen to prepare their own meals. A washing machine, dryer and hot water are available 24/7 for a charge, while valuables can be safely stored away in deposit boxes. Pagration Youth Hostel can offer travel and sightseeing assistance to guests from its tour desk. This Athens hostel is less than a 10-minute walk from Kallimarmaro Stadium, where the first modern Olympic tournament took place. Evangelismos Metro Station is one km away.

name: Athens Bluebuilding
description: Set 800 metres from Panathenaic Stadium, Athens BlueBuilding offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The apartment provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and bathrobes. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Athens BlueBuilding. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Athens BlueBuilding include Museum of Cycladic Art, National Garden and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 30 km from the apartment.

name: Nefeli Hotel
description: Nefeli Hotel is situated in the scenic area of Plaka, on the foothills of the Acropolis. The family-run hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with breakfast included. Less than 5 minutes’ walk from the Syntagma and Acropolis Metro Stations, the Nefeli Hotel serves as a great base for exploring the Greek capital. Breakfast is served each morning and includes jams and various breads and cakes. The front desk is always at the guests’ disposal with tourist information, can arrange for taxi transfers. Nefeli is conveniently situated at the heart of Athens' business and commercial centre. The surrounding area is full of typical Greek restaurants and café, as well as tourist shops.

name: Twin Circle Athens
description: Set in Athens, 600 metres from National Theatre of Greece and 1.5 km from the centre, Twin Circle Athens offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered in the kitchenette, as well as a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Twin Circle Athens include Larissis Railway Station, Omonia Square and National Archaeological Museum of Athens. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: The Artist Athens
description: Set in Athens, 300 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, The Artist Athens offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. Popular points of interest around the property include Monastiraki Square and Monastiraki Flea Market. The property is 500 metres from Adrianou Street and a 7-minute walk from Omonia Square. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at The Artist Athens also provide guests with a city view. All rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Popular points of interest near The Artist Athens include Roman Agora, Ancient Agora of Athens and National Theatre of Greece. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 35 km from the property.

name: Connect Suites
description: No description found

name: Victory Inn
description: Situated near the centre of Athens, Victory Inn offers great-value, comfortable accommodation, just 500 metres from Victoria Station for easy access to the historic district of Plaka and the Acropolis. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Each of the rooms at Victory Inn is tastefully decorated and appointed with a host of modern amenities, including satellite TV and air conditioning, for your comfort. The staff at Victory Inn are at your service 24-hours a day and happy to help you with all your requests. European breakfast can be enjoyed either at the dining area or at the privacy of your room. Victory Inn is just a short walk from Pedion tou Areos Park, Victoria Subway Station, the National Archaeological Museum and the Athens University of Economics & Business. A range of bars and restaurants is also located within a short walking distance of Victory Inn. Evelpidon Courts are 400 metres away. From here, you can take the metro to Athens’ historical centre.

name: Nlh Fix Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels
description: NLH FIX | Neighborhood Lifestyle Hotels is located in Athens, just steps from the National Museum of Contemporary Art and 400 metres from the New Acropolis Museum. Syggrou-Fix Metro Station is at a distance of 90 metres. It offers modern and elegant suites with free WiFi, air conditioning and views over the surrounding area. Fitted with Coco-mat mattresses, every suite at NLH FIX includes a 40'' Smart TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee maker, a laptop safe and a working desk. Each unit also includes a private mosaic bathroom with rainfall shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites also comprise a kitchenette. Guests can choose among a 9-option breakfast menu that comes to their suite in a box at extra charge. The options include vegan, vegetarian, gluten free and a kid's menu. The staff of NLH FIX will offer you local tips, so that you can experience the city of Athens like a local. The scenic district of Plaka lies within a short walking distance of NLH FIX, while Syntagma Square can be reached within a 10-minute walk.Athens International Airport is 36 km from the property. Airport or port transfer can be arranged.

name: Thiseio 1915
description: Set in Athens, 1.3 km from the centre and 400 metres from Temple of Hephaestus, Thiseio 1915 offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ancient Agora of Athens, Gazi - Technopoli and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 34 km from Thiseio 1915, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Athenian Residences
description: Athenian Residences is located in Athens, in the Athens City Centre district. The property is set 300 metres from Ancient Agora of Athens. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. The units at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. Selected rooms will provide you with a kitchen with an oven and a toaster. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Athenian Residences offers an outer plunge pool, while beauty services can be provided upon charge. A breakfast box is provided in the units daily. Ermou Street-Shopping Area is 300 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 33 km from the property.

name: Theasis Athens
description: Located in Athens, 100 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and less than 1 km from the centre, Theasis Athens provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a toaster, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a minibar and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. A car rental service is available at the bed and breakfast. Popular points of interest near Theasis Athens include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Square and Temple of Hephaestus. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Xenophon Hotel
description: With views of the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill, this 4-star Athens hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony. Kato Patisia Train Station is a 200-metre distance, and offers connection to the metro. All rooms at Xenophon Hotel come with simple wooden furnishings. Each room provides a TV, private bathroom and central heating. Free WiFi access and direct dial line are available. Guests can take their breakfast at the hotel’s dining room. There is also a lounge bar available, serving a variety of hot and cold beverages. Room service is available until 03:00 hours. Hotel Xenophon is located near the centre of Athens. Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport and Piraeus Port can be reached with the metro. Bus stops opposite the hotel and offer access to the National Railway. A limited number of free parking spaces is available right in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Katerina
description: Situated in the commercial centre of Athens, Hotel Katerina is just 25 metres from Metaxourgio Metro Station and 250 metres from Larissis Railway Station. Its rooms offer free Wi-Fi and free parking is provided. The modern and bright rooms at the Katerina hotel have spacious bathrooms and soundproofed windows. Each is further equipped with TV, minibar, safe and air conditioning. Omonia Square is 500 metres from the hotel and Plaka and the Acropolis are a 5-minute metro ride away. The National Archaeological Museum is 10 minutes away on foot. Hotel Katerina serves a Greek breakfast daily. Visitors have easy access to different areas of Greece, with the airport situated just 40 minutes away and Port of Piraeus only 30 minutes by Metro.

name: Klepsydra Urban Suites
description: Ideally set in the heart of Athens, Klepsydra Urban Suites is housed in a restored neoclassical building and offers stylish accommodation with free WiFi access. Monastiraki Square is 700 metres from the property, while hip bars and restaurants are just a stone's throw away. Fitted with parquet floors, high ceilings and elegant furnishings, the apartments, studios and suites at Klepsydra come with a seating area with flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette with coffee machine, microwave and kettle. The modern bathrooms have a walk-in shower, bathrobes and free toiletries. Some units also boast a balcony and some have city views. Syntagma Square is 700 metres from Klepsydra Urban Suites, while Ermou Shopping Street can be reached within a 7-minute walk. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 38 km away.

name: Phidias Hotel
description: Centrally located on the pedestrian street of Apostolou Pavlou, Phidias Hotel is just 250 metres from the Acropolis and 100 metres from Thision Metro Station. It has a bar and offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Phidias rooms have a private balcony with city or garden views. They are equipped with a satellite TV, iron and hairdryer. Each room has a private bathroom with shower. Phidias has a lounge area, where guests can enjoy coffees and drinks from the bar. Continental breakfast is served in the morning. Thission Train Station is 150 metres away from the hotel, while the Ancient Market is at 100 metres. Free parking can be found near the premises.

name: Ruby Rooms Kifisia
description: Located in Athens, 5.4 km from Goulandris Natural History Museum, Ruby Rooms Kifisia provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Ruby Rooms Kifisia have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Ruby Rooms Kifisia. Helexpo - Maroussi is 10 km from the hotel, while The Mall Athens is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Ruby Rooms Kifisia.

name: Hestia - Asklipiou 61
description: No description found

name: toStay-Unique apartment hotel in Athens center!
description: Located 500 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 400 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, toStay-Unique apartment hotel in Athens center! in Athens provides air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, an oven and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Square, Omonia Square and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from toStay-Unique apartment hotel in Athens center!, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Estia boutique apartments
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a Smart TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Elikon
description: Elikon is centrally located in Athens,within a 3-minute' walk from Omonoia Metro Station and just 50 metres from restaurants and shops. It offers accommodation with free WiFi access and balcony. Fitted with wooden or tiled floors, the simply decorated rooms and dormitory rooms of Elikon are equipped with a TV and wardrobe. A shared bathroom with shower and toilet is available. Elikon is located 1 km from the National Archaeological Museum and 1.5 km from Syntagma Square. Acropolis Hill lies within 3 km, while the shopping street of Ermou is at a distance of 1.5 km. Private parking at extra charge can be found nearby.

name: 11 Enteka Acropolis Suites
description: Attica’s most vibrant neighbourhood, in the very heart of Athens, 11 Enteka Acropolis Suites awaits to welcome you. 11 Enteka Acropolis Suites is located at the foot of Acropolis hill and just a few steps away of all the historical monuments of Athens such as Plaka, Monastiraki, Syntagma, Herodium, Acropolis Hill (650meters away), Ermou street (shopping center), Filipappou, Panathenaic Stadium, Pnyx, Ancient Agora, Romaic Agora and many more to visit. Easy accessible by metro Acropolis station (100 meters away). Designed in an elegant modern and minimalistic sense, 11 Enteka Acropolis Suites features exceptional services and world-class facilities at the city’s best address. In excellent brand new rooms you may enjoy relaxation moment and all the comforts that you may need during your stay. All rooms offer street view away from the city noise. You are more than welcome to enjoy our breakfast in a modern and warm environment such us our breakfast area. With attention to details and respect to all guest, it becomes just the perfect choice for your stay. In this property there is contactless and keyless check in. All guest will receive via mail 2 codes. One code for the main entrance of the hotel and a second one to enter to their room. Room number will be advice as well in the same mail. All rooms are equipped with Smart TV (from 32" to 43” flat screen ), armored/ doors, safe box lap top size, mini bar, direct telephone line, internet connection, hairdryer, A/C, Heating, Queen size beds, and bath products. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Temple of Olympion Zeus, Anafiotika and Odeum of Herodes Atticus. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 34 km from 11 Enteka Acropolis Suites and the nearest port is Pireaus.

name: Athens La Strada
description: Villa Brown Ermou a member of Brown Hotels is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Athens. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are there for guest's enjoyment. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with slippers, closet, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Villa Brown Ermou a member of Brown Hotels combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Athens unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Nicola Hotel
description: Nicola Hotel is a quiet, friendly hotel offering free parking and free Wi-Fi, right by Park Dikastirion and close to Athens city centre. The hotel is decorated in the traditional style of the city, and the friendly staff offer Greek hospitality to guests 24 hours of the day. Guests can make use of the computer in the lobby or relax with a drink at the bar or on the open-air terrace. From Nicola Hotel guests can use public transportation links to reach the the National Archaeological Museum, the business centre, shopping area, and trendy cafés and restaurants.

name: The Marblous Athens
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a Smart TV. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and a pillowtop bed.Expedia

name: Athens Comfort
description: Centrally located in Athens, 500 metres from National Archaeological Museum, Athens Comfort offers elegantly decorated units with free WiFi and views over the city. Acropolis Rock and the scenic Plaka district are 2.5 km away. Fitted with soft colous and modern furnishings, all units open to a balcony, some of which offer views over the Acropolis or Lycabettus Hill. Each features a flat-screen TV, and a well-equipped kitchenette with fridge and stovetop. The private bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Omonia Square is 700 metres from Athens Comfort, while Metaxourgeio and Stahmos Larisis Metro Stations lie within a 5-minute walk. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 35 km away.

name: Athens Cypria Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from Syntagma Metro Station, Athens Cypria Hotel features a stylish café-bar, an internet corner and rooftop bar with Acropolis view. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and satellite TV, and lies within a 10-minute walk of the New Acropolis Museum. All rooms at Athens Cypria come with a safe box, a fully stocked minibar and tea/coffee facilities. Some have balconies with Acropolis views, while others have no balcony. There are also family rooms and discounts for children. A rich American breakfast including a Greek breakfast corner, is served daily from 07:00 to 10:30 on the mezzanine floor. The on-site Annabel Cafe offers a wide selection of spirits, cocktails, wines and snacks. A great variety of restaurants and traditional taverns can be reached on foot. Athens Cypria is adjacent to Ermou Street, the most commercial street in Athens. Athens International Airport is at a distance of 38 km away.

name: Novotel Athenes
description: Novotel Athenes is the perfect hotel to live the authentic Greek experience in the heart of Athens. Relax and unwind in one of our 196 rooms. Food lovers will enjoy discovering international flavors at our restaurants. Savor 360° views of Athens and Acropolis from the roof terrace or re-energize in the gym and the outdoor pool during summer. For successful meetings, 8 flexible conference rooms will inspire you. Immerse yourself in Greek culture from our hotel near the city center, museums and monuments.accorhotels.com

name: Emporikon Athens Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Athens City, the neoclassical Emporikon Athens Hotel, in Agia Irini Square, is a 19th century building. It features air-conditioned accommodation with Acropolis or Lycabettus Hill views. Monastiraki Metro Station is 300 metres away. Fitted with a flat-screen TV, all rooms and suites of Emporikon Athens come with a minibar. Each has a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some units open to a balcony or offer an open-plan or separate seating area. The property facilities include a 24-hour front desk and a ticket service. Bicycle and car rental services are provided. Several café bars and restaurants can be reached within a short walk. Syntagma Square is 600 metres away and the popular sites of the Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum are at a distance of approximately 1 km. The scenic Plaka district is a 5-minute walk away. Piraeus Port is 15 km away and Athens International Airport is 35 km away.

name: Athinn Residence
description: Well located in the centre of Athens, AthINN Residence provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. The property is set 400 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, 400 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 500 metres from Roman Agora. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Each room is fitted with a coffee machine, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with an oven. At AthINN Residence each room has bed linen and towels. You can play darts at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near AthINN Residence include Syntagma Square, University of Athens - Central Building and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Niki Athens Hotel
description: Niki Hotel is centrally located just 500 metres from the Acropolis and 100 metres from Syntagma Square and the Metro. It has a stylish lounge bar and offers modernly decorated rooms with free, high-speed WiFi. Fitted with Coco-mat mattresses and luxurious linen, the rooms at Niki Athens Hotel have an elegant bathroom with shower cabin, bathrobes, slippers and Zealots toiletries. Each also includes a 40' Smart TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine, a mini bar and a work desk. Guests can have snacks and drinks throughout the day at the stylish lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on the historic as well as contemporary sites in Athens. The hotel is right next to a bus stop, allowing easy access to the Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport 25 km away. The old city of Plaka, and the Monastiraki Flea Market are within a 10-minute walk.

name: Alter Athens
description: Alter Athens offers accommodation in the heart of Athens, within 1.2 km from Panepistimio Metro Station. Free WiFi is provided in the public areas. Rooms are air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV. They all include a private bathroom with hairdryer, while some also feature a spa bath, slippers and free toiletries. Lycabettus Theater is 700 metres from Alter Athens, while National Archeological Museum is 700 metres from the property. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 19 km away.

name: Live in Athens, Psyrri Central Apartments
description: No description found

name: Urban Tales
description: Located in the centre of Athens, within 500 metres of Monastiraki Metro Station and 500 metres of Monastiraki Railway Station, Urban Tales offers accommodation with free WiFi. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Square, Omonia Square and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from Urban Tales, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Royal Olympic Hotel
description: A short walk from the Acropolis, 5-star Royal Olympic Hotel is located right in front of the Temple of Olympian Zeus and features an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Guests can taste traditional Greek cuisine or enjoy a cocktail at the rooftop Ioannis bar-restaurant offering panoramic views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Royal Olympic are air conditioned and include a mini bar, hairdryer and bathroom amenities. Each soundproofed unit has a work desk, a satellite TV and a bathroom with shower or bathtub. Most units offers views over the Temple of Zeus or the swimming pool garden. Hotel facilities include 18 fully equipped meeting rooms, all flooded with natural light and accommodating up to 700 guests. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the hotel, while the multilingual staff is available 24/7. A library is also available on site. The Royal Olympic is within a 4-minute walk from the picturesque Plaka neighbourhood, where a variety of traditional restaurants and souvenirs shops is featured. Syntagma Square is 1 km away and Athens International Airport is at 35 km.

name: Delice Hotel Apartments
description: Just a few minutes walk away from Athens' National Gallery, Delice Hotel - Family Apartments offers a variety of comfortable accommodation for short and long stay guests and is close to the metro station. WiFi is offered throughout. The Delice Hotel - Family Apartments offers air-conditioned units with a balcony. Some accommodation types feature a well-equipped kitchen. Delice's friendly hotel team is at your assistance 24 hours a day. There is also a breakfast room and snack bar available should you prefer to rest from cooking. Whilst staying at Delice Hotel - Family Apartments, you can easily reach the historic district of Plaka. You are also within walking distance of a variety of restaurants and bars.

name: Acropolis Luxury Living
description: Acropolis Boutique Residence where the luxurious and elegant design meets with the culture of the Athenian civilization. Its amenities and great location secure the well being of the guests. The aristocratic aura of this unique residence as long with all its comforts can guarantee a unique experience in the heart of Athens. Acropolis Boutique Residence is located in Acropolis area, and is committed to providing high quality service to all guests. Primary goal of the residence is to combine luxury with affordability. The master bedroom (bedroom with its own bathroom) features a large queen size double bed and the other one features two single beds (with the possibility to connect them and make it a double queen). All beds are equipped with American imported mattresses and furnished with high quality linens and pillows which provide to the guests an ultimate sleeping experience. In each bedroom has a 45’ smart TV flat screen, individual stereo system with USB gates and separately ample closet space. The living room features two comfortable sofas, one of which turns into an extra comfortable queen size double bed. The living room also includes a 50’ smart TV ultra HD 4k flat screen with surround sound system. The residence also features a fully equipped kitchen including stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee machine, teapot with free English tea, filter coffee maker, kettle and toaster. The residence is equipped with a washing machine, iron and ironing board as long as with space for luggage storage. The bathrooms are fully equipped with towels and amenities such as soaps, shampoos, conditioners, shower gels and two blow dryers. The bathroom amenities are provided by a very well known Greek brand. Our high speed VDSL 50 mbps Wi-Fi, ensures your stay connected throughout your trip. The dining room area can accommodate up to 6 visitors for a superb meal. The house is centrally heated during the winter months as well as individually air-conditioning units to all spaces. This apartment is located in Koukaki area which is considered the perfect starting point for the visitors to reach all main attractions in the center of Athens without using any kind of public transportation. Acropolis Boutique Residence will help you to connect with Greek culture.VRBO

name: Theoxenia Residence
description: Theoxenia Residence is set in Kifisia, an exclusive suburb in Athens featuring high-end restaurants and boutiques. It offers an outdoor pool and on-site restaurant specialising in Greek and Italian cuisine. Its elegantly designed suites feature free WiFi. Boasting Athens and garden views, every suite at Theoxenia Residence includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Its marble bathrooms are stocked with a bath, while free toiletries are also offered. Air conditioning comes standard. The uniquely designed bar offers a selection of alluring cocktails and Mediterranean specialty wines. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property. The world-renowned Acropolis and its magnificent museum are 12 km away. The Mall Athens and Golden Hall, the 2 major shopping malls of Athens, lie within 4 km and 5 km respectively. Athens International Airport is 29 km away.

name: Acropolis Magenta Luxury Suites
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Acropolis Magenta Luxury Suites is set in Athens, 300 metres from Acropolis Museum and 800 metres from Odeum of Herodes Atticus. With a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 100 metres from Syngrou/Fix Metro Station. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Acropolis Magenta Luxury Suites offers some units that feature a terrace, and all rooms include a coffee machine. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Acropolis Magenta Luxury Suites can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking Greek, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Akropolis Metro Station, Filopappos Hill and Temple of Olympion Zeus. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Acropolis Magenta Luxury Suites.

name: Bob W Akadimia Athens
description: Here at the Magenta Luxury suites Athens we offer you an experience you won’t forget, enjoying a variety of luxurious accommodation, comprehensive guest facilities and services. We make living easy, affordable and take care of everyday details. Two interconnecting Suites in the heart of Athens, high end design with a state of art technology and great ambiance feel and look. Relax on a queen size bed, comfortable pillows, hypoallergenic linen and a Full HD flat TV 32” with satellite channels. Enjoy making your coffee at the espresso machine on your fully equipped kitchenette. Fully soundproof with high standards of fireproof. Two separate bathrooms with heated towel racks. Free wireless wi-fi. Ideal for two couples or a family.Expedia

name: St George Lycabettus Hotel
description: Nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill, the St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel affords breathtaking panoramic views over Athens to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond. Guests are also perfectly positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonakis alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant, family-friendly hotel in the center of the city the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer!iHotelier/iStay

name: athensvintage
description: Located in Athens, 300 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 700 metres from the centre, athensvintage provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from athensvintage, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: Set in Athens, Navitas House offers accommodation 1.9 km from Monastiraki Railway Station and 1.8 km from Omonia Square. Free WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near Navitas House include Kerameikos Metro Station, Gazi - Technopoli and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 34 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: Boasting a fitness centre, Starlight Residence is situated in the centre of Athens, close to National Theatre of Greece, Omonia Square and Monastiraki Square. Complimentary WiFi is offered and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city or mountain views. The aparthotel provides a dry cleaning service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Starlight Residence include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Larissis Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Exarchion
description: Located in the lively Exarchia Square, Hotel Exarchion is just a 5-minute walk from the National Archaeological Museum and Omonia Metro Station. It offers a restaurant and bar. Syntagma Square and Monastiraki flea market are a 15-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. Each has a flat-screen TV, fridge and balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests may enjoy a good cup of coffee at the roof terrace with views over Lycabetus Hill. Buffet breakfast is daily served at the property's dining area. Staff at the multilingual 24-hour front desk can offer information on important sites, such as the Acropolis and Plaka that can be reached within a few minutes by metro. The Metro Station is just 300 metres away, offering easy access to every part of Athens. The shopping district of Athens is also a short walk away from the hotel.

name: Athens Delta Hotel
description: Situated in the heart of Athens, Delta Hotel is just steps away from the central train station and 2 minutes’ walk from the metro, providing comfortable accommodation and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Each of the rooms at Athens Delta Hotel is comfortably furnished and appointed with air conditioning and modern en suite bathroom facilities. Benefit from free wireless internet access in Athens Delta’s lobby. The reception is open 24-hours a day and staff are available to help you with any enquiries at all times. The convenient location of Athens Delta allows you to easily reach the city’s historical landmarks and you are just steps away from Athens’ vibrant nightlife.

name: Alegria house
description: Alegria house is located in the centre of Athens, close to Filopappos Hill, Syngrou/Fix Metro Station and Acropolis Museum. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Odeum of Herodes Atticus, Akropolis Metro Station and Neos Kosmos Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Alegria house.

name: Hotel Ilissos
description: Located 1.5 km away from the Acropolis, 4-star Ilissos features a roof garden bar overlooking the Parthenon. The Syngrou Fix Tram and Metro Station (Drakou Str. exit) are a 10-minute walk away. All elegant rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned with satellite TV and radio. Fridge and minibar are standard. A work desk is provided. Hotel Ilissos offers a restaurant serving Mediterranean and international cuisine. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Room service is also provided. Staff at the 24-hour reception desk can arrange bicycle and car rental and offer travelling information. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. Illisos Hotel is easily accessible by all means of transportation, giving guests easy access to and from every part of the city and its many attractions. The beaches of Athens are just 4 km away.

name: Nafsika Hotel Athens Centre
description: Nafsika Hotel Athens Centre is a popular choice amongst travelers in Athens, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, taxi service are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like cleaning products, free welcome drink, linens, mirror, scale. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Athens has to offer by making Nafsika Hotel Athens Centre your base.Agoda

name: Grecotel Pallas Athena
address: 65 Athinas Street And Lycourgou Street, Athens 105 51
description: Centrally located, Grecotel Pallas Athena is next to Athens City Hall. It offers uniquely decorated accommodation with arty details. Facilities include a restaurant and a bar. Omonia Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away. Featuring hand-picked items and individually designed, all air-conditioned rooms and suites of Pallas Athena come with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each has a minibar and a hairdryer, while free Wi-Fi is included. Guests may enjoy Greek and Mediterranean gourmet dishes, prepared with fresh products from the property’s farm, at the restaurant's veranda, overlooking Kotzia Square. A lounge bar serving finger food and cocktails is offered. The scenic area of Plaka, as well as the popular sight of Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum can be reached within short walking distance. The central Syntagma Square is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Cecil Hotel
description: Boasting a prime location in the centre of Athens, and spectacular Acropolis views, Cecil offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Both Monastiraki and Omonoia Metro Station are a 5-minute walk away. The rooms of the family-run Cecil Hotel are simply furnished, while some feature wooden floors and iron beds. They are equipped with a TV and have a private bathroom with shower. Room service is available. Buffet breakfast is served daily in the Neoclassical dining area. The hotel also features a bar serving drinks and cocktails. The New Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km away from Cecil. Within walking distance, guests can also reach the areas of Thiseio and Psiri offering many dining and nightlife options.

name: Phaedra Hotel
description: Centrally located in Athens, in the scenic area of Plaka, Phaedra Hotel is 200 metres from Acropolis Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi just a 10-minute walk from Syntagma Square. Its rooftop terrace boasts panoramic Acropolis views. Featuring a TV, all rooms at the Phaedra offer a desk and telephone. Each has a private bathroom with shower and toiletries. Some units have a balcony. Ironing facilities are provided upon request. Early breakfast can be served upon request. Acropolis Museum is 250 metres away and the Temple of Zeus is at 150 metres. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer information on nearby shops, bars and restaurants serving traditional Greek or international cuisine.

name: Parnon Hotel
description: Parnon Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Omonia area. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, car hire are readily available for you to enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, wooden/parqueted flooring, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Athens has to offer by making Parnon Hotel your base.priceline.com

The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 31 km from New Times Home & Hotels Near Metro Station Athens Center.

The property is situated 3 km from National Technical University - Zografou Campus, 3.2 km from Athens Music Hall and 4.6 km from Museum of Cycladic Art. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a kettle, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop and a toaster. At The Newel Psychiko all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. University of Athens - Central Building is 4.8 km from The Newel Psychiko, while Lycabettus Hill is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from Museum of Cycladic Art. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace. At Project 3 Urban Chic Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Syntagma Metro Station, National Garden and University of Athens - Central Building. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 27 km from Project 3 Urban Chic Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Greek cuisine. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. All units at Art Suites Korai include air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Art Suites Korai include National Theatre of Greece, Omonia Square and Monastiraki Flea Market. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos, 34 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Free off-site parking can be provided upon request and availability.

Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge and kettle are also featured. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. A car rental service is available at Peri's Hotel. 3rd Vravrona Beach is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Artemis Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 4 km from Peri's Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

The rooms at Mansion are equipped with a wardrobe, and a private bathroom with shower cabin. Facilities include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Some open out to a balcony. Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant, while drinks and refreshing beverages are served at the bar. Packed lunches and groceries can be provided upon charge. The hotel also offers car hire. The New Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km from the property, while Onassis Cultural Centre is 500 metres away. The National Museum of Contemporary Art can be reached within a 5-minute walk. description: Housed in an industrial building featuring a steel and glass facade, Kubic Athens is a smart hotel centrally located in Athens. Combining cutting-edge technology and modern comforts, the hotel offers stylish rooms with free high-speed WiFi and tablets. A 24-hour modern bar is available on site. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows and decorated in light green and grey tones, all rooms at Kubic Athens are equipped with a 43'' LG Smart TV, USB ports, VoIP phone and soundproofed windows. The in-room tablet enables guests to control in-room temperature and lighting. The modern bathrooms come with a rain shower, free branded toiletries and a hairdryer. Extra facilities include 2 Apple Mac computers for guest's use, a conference room and free high-speed WiFi throughout. Guests can enjoy healthy, organic flavours, coffees and drinks from the on-site bar, while grab-and-go snacks are also available. Omonia Square is 500 metres from Brown Kubic, a member of Brown Hotels, while Metaxourgio Metro Station lies within a 4-minute walk away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 35 km away.

name: Athens Quinta
description: Centrally located in Athens, Athens Quinta offers vintage accommodation with a shared kitchen and shared lounge area, and a charming furnished courtyard. It provides free WiFi throughout and it is just a 10-minute walk from Syntagma Square. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning, wardrobe, lockers and towels. Shared bathrooms with showers are also available. Some rooms overlook the pedestrian street and others the garden. The hostel is 3 km away from the Acropolis. At just 20 metres from the property, there is a bus stop, while Panepistimio Metro Station is 500 metres away. Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport is 40 km away.

name: O2 Suites Glyfada
description: Located in Athens, 400 metres from Glyfada Beach A and less than 1 km from Glyfada Central Beach, O2 Suites Glyfada provides accommodation with air conditioning and access to a garden. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and shower. A fridge is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at O2 Suites Glyfada can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. O2 Suites Glyfada provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Agios Alexandros Beach is 1.6 km from O2 Suites Glyfada, while Glyfada marina is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 24 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ermoo Athens Modern Living
description: Located in Athens, 200 metres from the centre and a few steps from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Ermoo Athens Modern Living provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. The aparthotel offers an outdoor fireplace. Popular points of interest near Ermoo Athens Modern Living include Monastiraki Square, National Garden and Monastiraki Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from the accommodation.

name: Bedbox Hostel
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Athens, Bedbox Hostel is just steps from hip bars and restaurants. It has a 24-hour front desk, an industrial-style lounge and a shared kitchen with coffee machine, kettle and fridge. Free WiFi access is offered throughout. The rooms and dormitory rooms at Bedbox are air conditioned, and most provide access to a shared bathroom. Some open out to a private terrace. Monastiraki Square is 500 metres from the hostel, while Ermou Street-Shopping Area is 400 metres away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 37 km from the property.

name: To stay Aristofanous
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 11 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies or patios. 28-inch Smart televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities This smoke-free aparthotel offers complimentary parking nearby. Business}, Other Amenities A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Property Location A stay at toStay Athens places you in the heart of Athens, within a 10-minute walk of Acropolis and Monastiraki Flea Market. This aparthotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Syntagma Square and 6.6 mi (10.7 km) from Port of Piraeus. name: Meni Apartments
description: Set in Athens, 500 metres from National Theatre of Greece and 1.4 km from the centre, Meni Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, quiet street views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. A stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at Meni Apartments can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Omonia Square, Larissis Railway Station and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 30 km from Meni Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Byron
description: Right beneath the Acropolis and just 50 metres from the metro station and 100 metres from the new museum of Acropolis, resides the Byron Hotel. Hotel Byron enjoys a prime location in Plaka, Athens’ traditional area boasting neoclassical mansions and a host of traditional taverns and cafés. The air-conditioned guestrooms offer modern comforts including internet access. Some also enjoy great views to the Acropolis and to the famous Lycavitos Hill. Guests staying at the Byron may benefit from the free Wi-Fi internet access offered everywhere in the hotel. Breakfast is served on the rooftop garden offering unobstructed views over the Acropolis.

name: Ariston Hotel
description: Just 50 metres from Stathmos Larissis Metro Station and Athens Railway Station, Ariston Hotel is a 3-star hotel located in the centre of Athens. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception. Ariston offers 35 well appointed guestrooms decorated in warm and bright colours. Featuring a flat-screen, 32'' TV with over 8000 free channels, each offers high speed internet connection, soundproofing and orthopaedic mattress, as well as free toiletries and hairdryer. Housekeeping attends to rooms every day providing fresh clean towels and toiletries. The on-site restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast. Later in the evening, the comfortable lounge area is the perfect spot for relaxed moments with a drink or coffee. The bar also features a satellite TV. Guests are within 100 metres from a supermarket. The Acropolis Museum and the areas of Monastiraki and Plaka can be reached within an 8-minute metro ride. Direct connection to Athens International Airport is provided via Athens Suburban Railway.

name: Artemision
description: Situated in Athens and with National Theatre of Greece reachable within 400 metres, Artemision features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is close to University of Athens - Central Building, Monastiraki Square and Monastiraki Railway Station. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe, bed linen and a balcony with a city view. The rooms in Artemision are fitted with a flat-screen TV and bathrobes. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Omonia Square, National Archaeological Museum of Athens and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from Artemision.

name: Day in Athens
description: Day in Athens provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Athens, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Square, Monastiraki Railway Station and Monastiraki Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Day in Athens.
